channel.title: The Project on Discussions on r/politics
channel.description: Recent content in The Project on Discussions on r/politics

item.title: Data Description
item.description: During this project, we worked with three data sets Submissions from the r/politics subreddit mentioning “Trump” or “Biden posted between 10-01-2020 and 11-3-2020. The comments section of the above submissions. Polling data obtained from FiveThirtyEight. In the following, we will describe these data sets and give an overview of their most important properties. 1. The submissions Visitors at r/politics will quickly notice that the majority of the submissions posted on the site are by users linking to news articles published on news media sites like CNN or The Huffington Post.
